channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: TelevisaUnivision、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比7％増の$1.10B、調整後OIBDAは同9％減の$328.5M、DTC事業は2024年下半期に黒字化見込み（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
TelevisaUnivision reports Q1 revenue up 7% YoY to $1.1B, adjusted OIBDA fell 9% YoY to $328.5M, and expects its DTC business to be profitable in H2 2024  —  The Spanish-language media giant, led by Wade Davis, sees 2024 as “a historic year for us,” saying that “we expect that to drive commensurate political ad revenue.”

item.title: Comcast、第1四半期のPeacock収入は前年同期比54%増の$1.1B、損失は$639M、2023年第1四半期の$704Mから減少、有料会員数は前年同期比55%増の34M（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Comcast reports Q1 Peacock revenue rose 54% YoY to $1.1B, a $639M loss, down from $704M in Q1 2023, and paying subscribers up 55% YoY to 34M  —  NBCUniversal parent Comcast, led by chairman and CEO Brian Roberts, reported its first-quarter earnings. … The streamer ended March …

item.title: 報道の自由を擁護する人々は、ペルー政府がベテラン記者グスタボ・ゴリティに対する刑事捜査を通じて、独立系ニュースメディアを狙っているのではないかと懸念している（Samantha Schmidt/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Samantha Schmidt / Washington Post:
Press freedom advocates fear Peru's government is taking aim at the independent news media via a criminal investigation into veteran reporter Gustavo Gorriti  —  Few journalists have exposed government wrongdoing in Latin America quite like Gustavo Gorriti.

item.title: 1986年にイラン・コントラ疑惑を暴き、マイアミ・ヘラルド紙をピューリッツァー賞受賞に導いたアルフォンソ・チャーディは、4月9日、72歳で死去した（サム・ロバーツ／ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
Sam Roberts / New York Times:
Alfonso Chardy, whose methodical reporting led The Miami Herald to a Pulitzer Prize for exposing the Iran-contra scandal in 1986, died on April 9 at age 72  —  A Miami Herald correspondent, he powered a team that won a Pulitzer Prize for investigative reporting and helped snare three other Pulitzers for the paper.

item.title: 2022年に2人のスタッフでスタートし、現在19人のスタッフを抱える米国の調査報道機関「ザ・レバー」を見てみると、購読者数は11万2000人、有料購読者数は前年比16.5％増となっている（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
A look at US investigative outlet The Lever, which has 19 staffers after launching in 2022 with two staff, 112K subscribers, and paying subscribers up 16.5% YoY  —  The Lever's “bread and butter” reporting is “how corporate power is making everything worse for the rest of us”.

item.title: Redditによると、「ショッピングシグナル」を利用してユーザーに関連性の高い広告を自動的に表示する「Dynamic Product Ads」が、グローバルでパブリックベータを開始する（Scharon Harding/Ars Technica）。
item.description:
Scharon Harding / Ars Technica:
Reddit says its Dynamic Product Ads, which use “shopping signals” to automatically show relevant ads to users, are entering public beta globally  —  Reddit says its “communities are naturally commercial.”  —  Reddit has made it clear that it's an ad-first business.

item.title: テキサス大学で行われた親パレスチナ派の抗議デモで州警察と口論になり、テレビ局Fox 7 Austinのフォトジャーナリストが逮捕された（Robbie Farias/Austin American-Statesman）。
item.description:
Robbie Farias / Austin American-Statesman:
A photojournalist for TV station Fox 7 Austin was arrested after an altercation with state troopers at a pro-Palestinian protest at the University of Texas  —  A photojournalist with FOX 7 Austin was arrested during a pro-Palestinian protest at the University of Texas at Austin on Wednesday.

item.title: TKOグループ・ホールディングスの委任状提出書類：エンデバーのアリ・エマニュエルは、エンデバーがUFCとWWEを合併させた2023年に6500万ドル近い給与を受け取っていた（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Proxy filing for TKO Group Holdings: Endeavor's Ari Emanuel received a pay package of nearly $65M in 2023, the year that Endeavor merged UFC and WWE  —  TKO, the owner of the WWE and UFC, disclosed its executive pay packages in its proxy filing.  —  Endeavor's $21 billion deal to merge …

item.title: ワーナー・ミュージック・グループがUproxx、HipHopDX、その他の資産をジャレット・マイヤー、リッチ・アントニエロ、ウィル・アイ・アムが設立した新会社Uproxx Studiosに売却（Murray Stassen/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Murray Stassen / Music Business Worldwide:
Warner Music Group sells Uproxx, HipHopDX, and other assets to a new company, Uproxx Studios, formed by Jarret Myer, Rich Antoniello, and will.i.am  —  In February, Robert Kyncl - CEO of Warner Music Group - confirmed that WMG was in active discussions to sell its ‘owned and operated’ media properties UPROXX and HipHopDX.

item.title: インドのストリーミングサービス「JioCinema」が広告なしの定額プランを開始、最安層は1デバイスで月額0.35ドル、ライバルを下回る（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Indian streaming service JioCinema launches an ad-free subscription plan with the lowest tier costing $0.35/month for a single device, undercutting rivals  —  JioCinema, the popular Indian on-demand video-streaming service, introduced a new monthly subscription plan on Wednesday, with the lowest tier costing just 35 cents.

item.title: The Gateway Punditの創設者が、その親会社が連邦破産法第11章の適用を申請すると発表した。
item.description:
Will Sommer / Washington Post:
The founder of The Gateway Pundit says its parent company is filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy, as it faces lawsuits claiming it promoted bogus election claims  —  Gateway Pundit, the popular far-right blog, is filing for bankruptcy as it faces lawsuits alleging it promoted bogus claims …

item.title: メタの株価は、第2四半期の弱い収益ガイダンスと、AIインフラ投資の増加による2024年度の資本支出の増加で、時間外に15％以上下落した（Ashley Capoot/CNBC）
item.description:
Ashley Capoot / CNBC:
Meta's stock dropped 15%+ after hours on weak Q2 revenue guidance and higher FY 2024 capital expenditures due to increased AI infrastructure investments  —  Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of Meta, testifies during the Senate Judiciary Committee hearing titled “Big Tech and the Online Child Sexual Exploitation Crisis …

item.title: Apollo が支援する米投資グループ Concord が Hipgnosis Songs Fund への入札額を15億ドルに増額、Blackstone からの最後のオファーをわずかに上回る (Daniel Thomas/Financial Times)
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Apollo-backed US investment group Concord increases its bid for Hipgnosis Songs Fund, to $1.5B, just over the last offer from Blackstone  —  Offer for music rights group rises to $1.5bn as Apollo-backed investor beats rival's bid  —  Hipgnosis Songs Fund has found itself at the centre …

item.title: メタ、2024年3月期第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比27％増の$364.6億、純利益は同117％増の$123.7億、ファミリー世帯のデイリーアクティブ人口は同7％増の32.4億人（メタ・インベスター・リレーションズ）
item.description:
Meta Investor Relations:
Meta reports Q1 revenue up 27% YoY to $36.46B, net income up 117% YoY to $12.37B, and family daily active people up 7% YoY to 3.24B for March 2024  —  Meta Platforms, Inc. (Nasdaq: META) today reported financial results for the quarter ended March 31, 2024.

item.title: TikTokはTikTok Liteのリワードプログラムを一時停止し、子供向けLiteの中毒性の可能性に関するEUの懸念の解消に努める（Foo Yun Chee/Reuters）
item.description:
Foo Yun Chee / Reuters:
TikTok suspends the rewards program in TikTok Lite while the company tries to resolve EU concerns over the potentially addictive nature of Lite for children  —  TikTok will voluntarily suspend its new app TikTok Lite's reward programme while it tries to resolve EU concerns, the company said on X social media platform on Wednesday.
